title: 2 Pools, Newly Remodeled, On-Site Maintenance
neighborhood: 939 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV
posting_body: Discover affordable luxury lifestyle at our gated community that caters to a range of lifestyle activities.
Our gorgeous apartments boast high-end finishes like wood laminate flooring, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and spacious dual master suites.
Each apartment has 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 private bathrooms with features including walk in closets, modern kitchens, and breakfast bar.
Our staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional customer service.
Conveniently located just minutes from the famous Las Vegas Strip, local restaurants, shopping and additional entertainment.

Whether its hanging out with your friends, relaxing in the hot tub, cleaning your clothes at our laundry facility, or just getting some work done in the sanctity of your own apartment, The Point on Flamingo provides a luxurious and fun living.
Call today to book a tour!
-FREE Parking                                                                                                                                All parking is first-come, first-serve.
